Name: (Custom) Friendly Competition
Description: Get the key and be the first to the door to earn bragging rights!
Longdesc:
Friendly Competition
v1.5 by BobtheBunny

You only have 25 rounds to complete the game. Be the first to grab the key and get to the door! Watch out for the other heroes, they want the key too!

Toss bones, teleport lamps, and use your cunning wit to hinder the other heroes.

--------------

Suggested Rules:
Call a truce until the key is found.
Banish refreshes in 5 turns; use it on yourself at the start to scatter the heroes.
Use Banish only on yourself.
If you die, will you wait for the next floor or rejoin the game?

--------------

Maps and bosses are determined by the Demeo Book chosen.
All monsters are weaker and may do unexpected things!
Each Hero has more hit points, and 3 rounds to be revived or crawl towards help!
Strike Lamps to gain immunities and other effects.
Focus Potions cause Tangled when they wear off.
Courage is a 3x3 radius and causes negative effects when it wears off.
Courage and Sneak are 0AP
Stats increase to a maximum of +5, and stat potions increase +2 each time.

--------------

Guardian: priotitizes survivability and utility.
Hunter: roots, beasts, and tricks.
Assassin: blades, traps, and speed.
Sorcerer: elemental spells and destruction.
Bard: songs, scrolls, tornados, and water.
Warlock: wields strange magics gifted from an ancient source.
Barbarian: hooks lamps, prone to anger and corruption.

----------------
What's the Point?

+ points for damage to enemies
+ points for gold at the end
+ points for slaying a friendly
+ points for getting the key
+ points each round yu have the key
+ points for unlocking the door
+ points for killing blow on the boss
Rules: Hero loses a level if revived without using magic or potion
